Oscillations¶

Evidence of Oscillations¶

A lot of experiments have been done to research on neutrino oscillations. In summary there are three types,

  1. Solar neutrinos,
  2. Reactor and accelerator neutrinos,
  3. Atmosphere neutrinos.
